title: Constitution
content: Do we actually need to study for this? And if yes then from where do we study, cos there are no slides showing for us

comments.body: study from the question bank only, they ask everything from there. slides are useless.
Where are the qb's i ain't getting it..
Don't you guys have an isa whatsapp group or something. Just ask for it there, someone will have it.
But then people don’t even reply
it is there on pes media discord. I just looked.
Is it the same for EVS also?
Will the questions for EVS also come for QB
Someone sent it today only. Check the docs on the isa group.
its not there. you are talking about WhatsApp ISA group ryt?
The teachers will send a list of questions. Read it and you're good to go. I just read it once and still got high marks.
